# AI/LLM Usage Policy for rajeevpuri.com.np

ALLOWED_BOTS: ChatGPT, Bard, Claude, Bing AI
INDEXING: Allow
TRAINING: Deny
SCRAPING: Limited

This website permits:
- Reading and indexing of public content
- Analyzing portfolio projects
- Referencing code examples

This website restricts:
- Training AI models on portfolio content
- Automated scraping of personal information
- Reproduction without attribution

For AI/ML inquiries contact: contact@rajeevpuri.com.np
